akn:section.akn:heading: Acceptance of collateral in full or partial satisfaction of obligation; compulsory disposition of collateral.

akn:content.akn:p: Except as otherwise provided in subsection (g), a secured party may accept collateral in full or partial satisfaction of the obligation it secures only if:
A purported or apparent acceptance of collateral under this section is ineffective unless:
To be effective under subsection (a)(2), a notification of objection must be received by the secured party:
A secured party that has taken possession of collateral shall dispose of the collateral pursuant to ยง 28:9-610 within the time specified in subsection (f) if:
To comply with subsection (e), the secured party shall dispose of the collateral:
In a consumer transaction, a secured party may not accept collateral in partial satisfaction of the obligation it secures.
